content.question: From this passage, which of the following can be inferred about the friend’s attitude toward the situation?

choices.label: He wants to bravely face his own death.
He is optimistic that everyone will be okay.
He is set on his own and the others’ survival.

content.answer: He is set on his own and the others’ survival.

unit.text: 2: Pliny's Letters: Eruption of Mt. Vesuvius
